Create climatology

Visualise data

Plot mean monthly maximum for a given gridcell

Plot annual maximum DHW time series

Plot mean monthly maximum for a given gridcell

Plot seasonal SST vs. MMM with bleaching status

Simple XY plot for terra::rast values() comparisons
